definition: to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out

pinyin: shu4 zi4 dao3 lan3 she4 shi1

sentences.chinese: 实体基础设施和能源行业。

sentences.english: He says the new facility may make future tests more realistic.
sentences.chinese: 他说，新的设施可能使未来的测试变得更现实。

sentences.english: MKM-PS27ER: Smoke Generator with external fluid pumping facility.
sentences.chinese: 烟雾发生器与外部流体抽水设施。

sentences.english: Bokova that media facilities should not be the target of military operations.
sentences.chinese: 博科娃指出，媒体设施不应当成为军事行动的目标。

sentences.english: It has the biggest gap on the audience's satisfaction with comfort of spaces.
sentences.chinese: 观赏者对各设施空间舒适与气氛满意度之差异性较大。

sentences.english: Participate facility and equipment upgrades to improve plant productivity and throughput.
sentences.chinese: 参与升级厂房设施与设备以提高产率产量。
这些设施是怎么工作的呢？

sentences.english: This has happened even in developing-world countries with far less infrastructure than Japan has.
sentences.chinese: 这甚至在基础设施远不如日本的发展中国家也是如此。

sentences.english: Street-lamp lighting system is an essential part of public facility for city construction.
sentences.chinese: 路灯照明系统是城市建设不可缺少的公用设施。

sentences.english: And surveillance infrastructure can be exported, which also aids totalitarianism around the world.
sentences.chinese: 监视设施可以出口，这也助长了世界上的极权主义。

sentences.english: France's Gendarmerie Nationale recently decided to review its IT infrastructure policies.
sentences.chinese: 法国国家宪兵队最近决定整改它的IT基建设施政策。

sentences.english: We believe that urban infrastructure should be more comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为，城市基础设施建设应使人更加舒适。

sentences.english: Health facilities have been set up to diagnose and treat malaria.
sentences.chinese: 建立了卫生设施以诊断和治疗疟疾。

sentences.english: The aseismatic fortify that strengthens crucial point branch and lifeline establishment works.
sentences.chinese: 加强要害部门及生命线设施的抗震设防工作。

sentences.english: He checked the kitchen against the inventory .
sentences.chinese: 他根据清单检查厨房设施。

sentences.english: Bihar’s public services and infrastructure are among the worst in India.
sentences.chinese: 比哈尔邦的公共服务和基础设施位居印度最差行列。

faultless/complete/perfect/to leave nothing to be desired
